name: Freedom: A Time to Reckon
description: You assume the character of Carlos Romero, a former soldier in a Venezuelan village. One day the local guerrilla faction decides to loot and pillage your village, and kill anyone who tries to stand in their way.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8 or 10 Processor: 2.5 Ghz or faster processor (Intel) / 3.5 Ghz or faster processor (AMD) Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 1 GB RAM / Widescreen Storage: 3 GB available space Sound Card: optional Additional Notes: These specifications might cause a slow loading time.
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows Vista, 7, 8 or 10 Processor: 3 Ghz or faster processor (Intel) / 4 Ghz or faster processor (AMD) Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 1,5 GB RAM / Widescreen Sound Card: onboard Additional Notes: A Solid State Disk is recommended to speed up the loading time.
